author: lgray
body:
Built ontop of: CMSSW_7_0_X_2013-10-21-1400

First set of commits that complete the feature-set of the PF Egamma overhaul.
GEDPhotons should have increased efficiency since we now allow photons with primary tracks.

@nancymarinelli @beaudett Please let us know if there are any expected changes to variables that aren't isolation.
title: PF-Based Isolation for GED Electrons/Photons
